biography.placeOfBirth: Gerabronn, Crailsheim, Württemberg-Baden, West Germany [now Schwäbisch Hall, Baden-Württemberg, Germany]
biography.bio: Joschka Fischer was born on April 12, 1948 in Gerabronn, Crailsheim, Württemberg-Baden, West Germany as Joseph Martin Fischer. He is an actor, known for Joschka und Herr Fischer (2011), Khodorkovsky (2011) and Le grand Monopoly du gaz (2011). He has been married to Minu Barati since October 29, 2005. He was previously married to Nicola Leske, Claudia Bohn, Inge Fischer and Edeltraud Fischer.
biography.name: Joschka Fischer

biography.bio: Hans Koschnick was born on April 2, 1929 in Bremen, Germany. He was married to Christine. He died on April 21, 2016 in Germany.
biography.name: Hans Koschnick

biography.bio: Katharina Thalbach was born on January 19, 1954 in East Berlin, East Germany. She is an actress and director, known for The Tin Drum (1979), Sophie's Choice (1982) and Good Evening, Mr. Wallenberg (1990).
biography.name: Katharina Thalbach

biography.bio: Peter Grohmann is an actor, known for Joschka und Herr Fischer (2011) and Rumpe & Tuli (2010).
biography.name: Peter Grohmann

biography.bio: Norbert Erich Kröcher was born on July 14, 1950 in Berlin, Germany. He was married to Gabriele Kröcher-Tiedemann. He died on September 16, 2016 in Berlin.
biography.name: Norbert Erich Kröcher

biography.bio: Jonny Klinke was born on June 25, 1950 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Joschka und Herr Fischer (2011), Testosteron and Au coeur de la nuit (2002).
biography.name: Jonny Klinke

biography.bio: Daniel Cohn-Bendit was born on April 4, 1945 in Montauban, Tarn-et-Garonne, Midi-Pyrénées, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Andreas Baader - Der Staatsfeind (2002), Foreigners out! Schlingensiefs Container (2002) and Joschka und Herr Fischer (2011). He has been married to Ingrid Apel since 1987. They have one child.
biography.name: Daniel Cohn-Bendit

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Marie-Reine Haug yet.
biography.name: Marie-Reine Haug

biography.bio: Jürgen Hempel is an actor, known for Joschka und Herr Fischer (2011) and Intimate Report (1968).
biography.name: Jürgen Hempel

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Fehlfarben yet.
biography.name: Fehlfarben

biography.bio: Roger de Weck was born on October 17, 1953 in Fribourg, Switzerland.
biography.name: Roger de Weck

biography.bio: Yasir Arafat was born Rahman Abdul Rauf Arafat al-Qudwa al-Husayni on August 24, 1929. Although he was raised in Cairo, Egypt, he always considered himself a Palestinian. In the late 1940s while a student in Egypt, he became an ardent Arab nationalist and adopted the name Yasir, after Yasir al Birah, a famous Arab resistance leader. When Arafat as 14, he was involved in gunrunning for Arab guerrillas in Gaza, a task he continued to perform during the Arab-Israeli War of 1948. After the war, Arafat entered Cairo University where he received a degree in engineering in 1955. During his student days, he began to train secretly as a guerrilla, becoming an expert in demolitions and taking part in raids on British installations near the Suez Canal. After his graduation from the university, Arafat was commissioned as a lieutenant in the Egyptian army. He saw some combat at Port Said and Abu Kabir during the Suez war of October 29-November 6, 1956. In the mid-1960's, Arafat emerged as the chief military and political leader of the Palestian homeland movement. From his residence in Kuwait where he ran a successful engineering concern, he published the major nationalist organ, Our Palestine, and established Al Fatah, an acronym for the Movement for the Liberation of Palestine. In 1967, after the Arab defeat in the Six-Day War, he became the chairman of the Palestian Liberation Organization (PLO) where throughout the 1970s he directed the PLO in a series of terrorist attacks against Israel and its Western allies. In an effort to garner broader support for his movement in the 1980s he began to distance himself from the PLO's more violent factions like the Abu Nidal group, but has not firmly renounced terrorism as a means of achieving his goals to create a Palestinian state within Israel. He had residences in Gaza and Tunis, where the PLO has its headquarters. He died after a short illness in November 2004.
biography.name: Yasser Arafat

biography.bio: Dagmar Berghoff was born on January 25, 1943 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress, known for Gate to Heaven (2003), Die Deutschlandreise (1970) and NDR Talk Show (1979). She was previously married to Dr. Peter Matthaes.
biography.name: Dagmar Berghoff

biography.bio: Willy Brandt was born on December 18, 1913 in Lübeck [now Schleswig-Holstein], Germany as Herbert Ernst Karl Frahm. He was married to Brigitte Seebacher, Rut Brandt and Carlota Thorkildsen. He died on October 8, 1992 in Unkel, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany.
biography.name: Willy Brandt

biography.bio: Rudi Dutschke was born on March 7, 1940 in Schönefeld, Jüterbog-Luckenwalde, Germany as Alfred Willi Rudi Dutschke. He was married to Gretchen Dutschke. He died on December 24, 1979 in Århus, Denmark.
biography.name: Rudi Dutschke
